sentences.en: Formerly cautious to the point of being uncommunicative, my companions had changed out of recognition.
sentences.cn: 我们的同伴们过去谨小慎微得几乎不开口说话,可现在他们变得判若他人了.

sentences.en: He has an uncommunicative and eccentric disposition, and always stands aloof from anyone else.
sentences.cn: 他的性格孤僻, 他总是不和任何人接触.

sentences.en: Much psychiatric medicine is undramatic stuff , involving the prescription of drugs to uncommunicative patients.
sentences.cn: 许多精神病医学平淡无奇,包括给沉默寡言的患者开些处方药.

sentences.en: My daughter is very difficult, uncommunicative and moody.
sentences.cn: 我女儿很难对付，她不爱说话而且喜怒无常。

sentences.en: Roger, uncommunicative by nature, said nothing.
sentences.cn: 罗杰天性沉默寡言, 他一声不吭.

trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as uncommunicative, you are critical of them because they do not talk to other people very much and are unwilling to express opinions or give information
